item.description:
What are you thankful for this Thanksgiving season? We are thankful for our dogs & for meet-up groups! Best Friends Pet Care is hosting a festive fall party for our social friends. We have a indoor/outdoor play area specially designed for doggie play dates. We provide toys, plentiful water, and clean up. THIS MEET UP IS FREE. All breeds are welcome so long as your dog gets along with other dogs in a playgroup environment. Please be sure your dog is up to date on all vaccines including: Rabies, Distemper, and Bordetella. We can't wait to meet you and your pals....we will also have a special treat of goodie bags for the dogs and treats for their human companions!  

We are also holding an Angel Tree drive that supports local shelters, so if you are interested in bringing a donation for the homeless pets we will be collecting items through January 1st. Plese call for any further details!
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: We are Thankful for Meet-up Groups!
